description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You blast the mind of your target, causing their limbs to go limp and respond slowly. Creatures who fail the @Check[will|against:class-spell] suffer a -1 status penalty to Reflex saves for 2 rounds (1 round on success, -2 status penalty on critical failure). This is an Occult and Mental effect.
